      • registerRemoteRegistry

        protected void registerRemoteRegistry(org.openbase.jul.storage.registry.RemoteRegistry<?,?,?> registry)
        This method registers this registry remote as a registry proxy for the registry controller where the given remote registry is based on. This object than can be used for registry state checks and synchronization issues.
        Parameters:
        registry - a remote registry which must not be compatible with the Message type M declared for this registry remote.
